argumentText:
ARGUMENT
w z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oav | |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. On ) -> ( A +o B ) = ( rec ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) , A ) ` B ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_oafnex | |- ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) Fn _V |
| 3 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. On -> ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) Fn _V ) |
| 4 |  | #P_id | |- ( A e. On -> A e. On ) |
| 5 |  | #P_vex | |- w e. _V |
| 6 |  | #P_suceq | |- ( z = w -> suc z = suc w ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) = ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) |
| 8 | 5 | #P_sucex | |- suc w e. _V |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( w e. _V -> ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) ` w ) = suc w ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) ` w ) = suc w |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eleq1i | |- ( ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) ` w ) e. On <-> suc w e. On ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ralbii | |- ( A. w e. On ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) ` w ) e. On <-> A. w e. On suc w e. On ) |
| 13 |  | #P_suceloni | |- ( w e. On -> suc w e. On ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_mprgbir | |- A. w e. On ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) ` w ) e. On |
| 15 | 14 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. On -> A. w e. On ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) ` w ) e. On ) |
| 16 | 3, 4, 15 | #P_rdgon | |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. On ) -> ( rec ( ( z e. _V |-> suc z ) , A ) ` B ) e. On ) |
| 17 | 1, 16 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. On ) -> ( A +o B ) e. On ) |
